channel.title: HackMD Dev's Profile
channel.description: HackMD Dev's profile on HackMD - Powered by RSSHub

item.title: Community Guidelines
item.description:
We created HackMD to be a community where you can work together, share knowledge, interact, and form relationships. Community guidelines ensure these goals and make it a place where we can all feel proud to belong.

When someone violates these guidelines, our Community Growth team may take several steps to enforce them. These steps are:

removing content;
suspending workspaces;
removing accounts;
reporting to law enforcement.

Respect other HackMD users

item.title: Markdown quick start guide
item.description:
Markdown quick start guide
Welcome to HackMD! :tada:

This note will get you started on writing in Markdown in no time.

You can try things out right in this note as a playground or leave it in your workspace as a cheatsheet.

:::success

:bulb: Are you in Both Mode?

item.title: How to search/open notes without leaving the one you are working on?
item.description:
Oftentimes we'd like open another note to refer to while editing the current one.

Another use case is you have a series of notes to work through, and you want to open the next one without going back to your workspace.

【Spotlight】 could help!

How to bring up Spotlight
You can bring up Spotlight by clicking the <i class="fa fa-search" aria-hidden="true"></i> icon to the top of the navigation bar or keyboard shortcuts.:::info
:bulb: Hint
You have to sign in to HackMD first

item.title: 如何快速搜尋筆記標題、開啟筆記？
item.description:
我們常常在編輯一篇筆記的時候，想開啟另一篇作參考，或是有好多篇筆記要逐一編輯，不想中途切回工作空間找尋。這時你可以直接在編輯器裡打亮「聚光燈」，找出想要的筆記，並且馬上開啟它。

打開 <i class="fa fa-search" aria-hidden="true"></i> 聚光燈的方法（注意：必須先登入 HackMD）：從選單列的 <i class="fa fa-search" aria-hidden="true"></i> 放大鏡圖示
或按快捷鍵：Windows: <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>Shift</kbd>+<kbd>P</kbd>
Mac: <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>Shift</kbd>+<kbd>P</kbd>

叫出搜尋視窗後，輸入關鍵字，按 <kbd>Enter ⮐</kbd>，搜尋標題或標籤：
<img style="display:block; margin:auto;" width=450 src="https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SkstSUfvK.png" />

Spotlight 也會列出最近開啟過的筆記。
